entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING, Salluit
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:14 a.m. EDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Blizzard. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Blizzard ending near noon then snow. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 AM EDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 4:30 AM EDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High zero.
